org.eclipse.scada.da.server.common.item.factory

Class DefaultChainItemFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.scada.da.server.common.item.factory.CommonItemFactory
      • org.eclipse.scada.da.server.common.item.factory.HiveItemFactory
        • org.eclipse.scada.da.server.common.item.factory.FolderItemFactory
          • org.eclipse.scada.da.server.common.item.factory.DefaultChainItemFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemFactory

    public class DefaultChainItemFactory
extends FolderItemFactory
    An item factory with a default chain of item entries

    In order to apply your own chain you may override applyChain(DataItemBaseChained)

      • createSubFolderFactory

        public DefaultChainItemFactory createSubFolderFactory(java.lang.String name)
        Create a new sub factory

        Sub-factories get disposed when the parent factory is disposed

        Overrides:
        createSubFolderFactory in class FolderItemFactory
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the sub-factory, this will be the folder name and added to the item id as local part
